metadata.title: The Fractured Meridian
metadata.description: A world shattered by magical catastrophe. Restore the waystone to heal the land.
metadata.author: Big Game Project

locations.name: Nexus Chamber
locations.description: The central hub connecting all five devastated regions.

traits: vast domed chamber with impossible geometry
five doorways pulsing with different elemental energies
damaged waystone at center, surface cracked and dim
twilight glow suffusing space from no visible source
ancient runes spiraling across floor in mandala pattern
crystalline formations growing from ceiling like chandeliers
spiral stairway ascending to observatory above
air thick with latent magical potential
llm_context.atmosphere: nexus of power, hub of possibilities, threshold between realms

state_variants.first_visit: The chamber's vast space and pulsing energies are overwhelming. This is clearly a place of great significance.
state_variants.revisit: The familiar convergence point, doorways waiting to carry you onward.
state_variants.all_regions_unlocked: All five doorways glow steadily, the network fully restored and accessible.

locations.name: Observatory Platform
locations.description: An elevated observation platform high above the nexus chamber.

traits: circular stone platform open to perpetual twilight sky
telescope mounting in center, empty and waiting
waist-high wall offering panoramic view of fractured landscape
all five devastated regions visible through breaks in clouds
elevated high above nexus chamber below
sense of watching and being watched
llm_context.atmosphere: place of observation and discovery, threshold to cosmic knowledge

state_variants.first_visit: The empty telescope mount and celestial charts suggest this was once a place of great learning.
state_variants.revisit: The familiar platform, still waiting for its telescope to be restored.
state_variants.telescope_repaired: The restored telescope gleams in its mount, ready to pierce the veil of distance once more.

locations.name: Keeper's Quarters
locations.description: The meridian keeper's personal chambers, frozen in temporal stasis.

traits: food on table appearing fresh despite unknown years
personal effects lying about as if occupant just stepped away
spectral presence lingering here, stronger than elsewhere
llm_context.atmosphere: scholar's sanctuary, dedication made manifest

state_variants.first_visit: The keeper's dedication is evident in every carefully organized space. This was a life of purpose.
state_variants.revisit: The keeper's quarters, still holding the memory of scholarly devotion.

locations.name: Crystal Garden
locations.description: A grotto holding five pedestals for regional resonance crystals.

traits: serene grotto where crystalline formations grow from walls and floor
each crystal corresponding to one of the devastated regions
crystals once resonated with health of their regions
now dim and broken, waiting to be restored
llm_context.atmosphere: mineral wonderland, geologic art, patient creation

state_variants.first_visit: The crystal formations are stunning, nature's slow artistry.
state_variants.revisit: The crystal garden, beauty eternal in stone.

locations.name: Frozen Pass
locations.description: The northern passage from the nexus into the Frozen Reaches.

traits: narrow defile between ice walls where eternal winter grips
cold wind howling through pass, carrying snow flurries
temperature dropping noticeably from nexus warmth
abandoned camp half-buried in snow to one side
former occupants frozen where they fell
wind funneling through creating constant howl
llm_context.atmosphere: confined passage, wind's fury, difficult travel

state_variants.first_visit: The wind through the pass is brutal, cold cutting deep.
state_variants.revisit: The frozen pass, wind howling as always.

locations.name: Temple Sanctum
locations.description: An ancient temple sanctum deep in the frozen peaks.

traits: vast chamber lined with frost-covered stone pillars
ancient carved faces watching from walls, expressions frozen
two massive stone guardians at far end, runes glowing dimly
side chamber near entrance holding treasures
inscriptions covering walls - fragments of forgotten knowledge
peace and power despite frozen desolation
llm_context.atmosphere: holy space, sanctuary of enduring faith

state_variants.first_visit: The sanctum's peace feels almost tangible, a refuge from chaos.
state_variants.revisit: The familiar sanctum, peace waiting within.
state_variants.blessing_received: The sanctum glows with renewed divine favor, your worthiness recognized.

locations.name: Ice Caves
locations.description: A labyrinth of ice chambers carved deep within the glacier.

traits: crystal blue walls refracting light into dancing patterns
breath freezing instantly in frigid air
main chamber with ice crystals growing from walls
deeper sections where frozen pools lie still
floor making ominous cracking sounds underfoot
llm_context.atmosphere: frozen labyrinth, beauty and danger, cold's palace

state_variants.first_visit: The ice caves are breathtakingly beautiful and lethally cold.
state_variants.revisit: The familiar ice caves, frozen beauty eternal.

locations.name: Glacier Approach
locations.description: A treacherous path winding between massive ice formations. The glacier looms ahead, its surface scarred by deep crevasses. The cold here is intense, threatening hypothermia to the unprepared.

traits: final approach to frozen realm's heart
llm_context.atmosphere: ascent, anticipation, approaching cold's source

state_variants.first_visit: The glacier ahead is massive, ancient ice accumulated.
state_variants.revisit: The glacier approach, ascending toward ice.

locations.name: Ice Field
locations.description: A vast expanse of snow and ice stretching to the horizon. The wind whips across the open terrain, making progress difficult. Snow drifts hide treacherous footing.

llm_context.atmosphere: desolation, exposure, endless frozen waste

state_variants.first_visit: The ice field's vastness is overwhelming, horizon to horizon white.
state_variants.revisit: The ice field, endless as always.

locations.name: Hot Springs
locations.description: A geothermal oasis of warmth in the frozen landscape.

traits: steam rising from pools of heated water
sulfurous mist clinging to multicolored mineral deposits
warmth like an embrace after bitter cold
small fire-wreathed salamanders basking near hottest pools
llm_context.atmosphere: geothermal refuge, warmth's persistence, contrast to cold

state_variants.first_visit: The hot springs' warmth is shocking after the frozen realm's cold.
state_variants.revisit: The hot springs, warmth bubbling eternal.

locations.name: Snow Forest
locations.description: Skeletal trees rise from deep snowdrifts, their branches heavy with ice. The forest provides some shelter from the wind but visibility is poor among the close-packed trunks.

traits: tracks of animals visible in drifts
llm_context.atmosphere: winter realm, pristine white silence, cold's domain

state_variants.first_visit: The snow-laden forest is beautiful and treacherous in equal measure.
state_variants.revisit: The familiar snow forest, frozen and still.

locations.name: Wolf Den
locations.description: A sheltered cave in a rocky outcropping, clearly used as a den by the local wolf pack. Bones and scraps litter the entrance. The pack's scent marks the territory.

traits: den worn smooth by pack's passage
llm_context.atmosphere: lair, danger, pack's sanctuary

state_variants.first_visit: The scattered bones and strong scent make the danger clear.
state_variants.revisit: The wolf den, pack territory marked clearly.
state_variants.pack_friendly: The wolves' scent carries no threat now, territory shared.
state_variants.pack_defeated: The den stands empty, pack scattered or fallen.

locations.name: Glacier Surface
locations.description: The surface of the ancient glacier, a landscape of blue ice and white snow. Crevasses yawn open without warning. The cold here is brutal, sapping strength with every breath.

traits: surface scored by wind and time
llm_context.atmosphere: summit of ice, ancient cold, time made tangible

state_variants.first_visit: Standing on ice thousands of years old, time compressed beneath boots.
state_variants.revisit: The glacier surface, ice eternal.

locations.name: Frozen Observatory
locations.description: An astronomical observatory frozen in magical ice.

traits: ancient structure encased in magical ice
great telescope pointing skyward through cracked dome
twin to the telescope in the nexus
relentless wind trying to tear visitors from platform
extreme cold - exposure lethal without protection
knowledge frozen in time, waiting for rescue
llm_context.atmosphere: frozen preservation, knowledge iced, stasis magical

state_variants.first_visit: The entire observatory frozen in perfect preservation. Why?
state_variants.revisit: The frozen observatory, ice unchanged.
state_variants.ice_melting: The ice is beginning to thaw, observatory awakening.

locations.name: Forest Edge
locations.description: The boundary where the nexus gives way to wild woodland. The Beast Wilds stretch beyond, a tangled mass of overgrown forest where nature has run rampant since the catastrophe. Animal sounds echo from the darkness beneath the canopy.

traits: path worn by hunters and travelers
safety of town behind, unknown ahead
llm_context.atmosphere: threshold, journey's beginning, wild calling

state_variants.first_visit: The forest ahead feels both inviting and ominous.
state_variants.revisit: The familiar forest edge, gateway to wilderness.

locations.name: Tangled Path
locations.description: A narrow trail winding through dense undergrowth. Vines and roots make progress difficult. The sounds of the wild are louder here - rustling, growling, the snap of branches. Paths branch in several directions.

llm_context.atmosphere: overgrown, challenging passage, wilderness asserting

state_variants.first_visit: The path is barely maintained, nature fighting every cleared inch.
state_variants.revisit: The tangled path, growth ever persistent.
state_variants.path_cleared: Recent clearing has made passage easier, though still challenging.

locations.name: Ancient Grove
locations.description: A clearing dominated by massive ancient trees, their trunks wider than houses. The air is thick with the hum of bees from somewhere nearby. This place feels sacred, untouched by the catastrophe.

traits: roots thick as houses breaking surface
moss carpeting everything in green velvet
llm_context.atmosphere: primordial, sacred, time measured in centuries

state_variants.first_visit: These trees were old when the town was young. What have they witnessed?
state_variants.revisit: The timeless grove, ancient and enduring.

locations.name: Bee Queen's Clearing
locations.description: A sun-dappled clearing dominated by an enormous hive in the branches of a great oak. Bees swarm around the hive in organized patterns, and at the center of their activity, something larger moves.

traits: bees filling air with purposeful flight
llm_context.atmosphere: underground hive, magical ecosystem, queen's realm

state_variants.first_visit: An underground clearing with flowering plants and thriving hive. How?
state_variants.revisit: The bee queen's clearing, hive buzzing with life.
state_variants.queen_friendly: The bees acknowledge your presence without aggression.
state_variants.queen_hostile: The bees swarm defensively, queen's territory threatened.

locations.name: Spider Thicket
locations.description: Webs span between trees, creating a maze of silk. The spiders here have grown large since the catastrophe. They watch from the shadows, their many eyes glittering.

llm_context.atmosphere: web-choked, predator territory, silk everywhere

state_variants.first_visit: The sheer quantity of webbing is unnerving. How many spiders?
state_variants.revisit: The spider thicket, webs thick as always.

locations.name: Spider Matriarch's Lair
locations.description: A cavern hung with ancient webs, thick as curtains. In the center, surrounded by her brood, sits the Spider Matriarch - a creature of terrifying size and alien intelligence.

traits: egg sacs clustered in protected alcoves
throne of web for giant occupant
llm_context.atmosphere: lair, breeding ground, silk fortress

state_variants.first_visit: The web construction is sophisticated, the work of intelligence and time.
state_variants.revisit: The matriarch's lair, web throne waiting.
state_variants.matriarch_defeated: The webs hang empty, eggs abandoned without guardian.

locations.name: Southern Trail
locations.description: A worn path leading south toward signs of civilization. The forest thins here, and the sounds of human activity occasionally drift on the wind. A dark cave mouth is visible to the north.

llm_context.atmosphere: passage, connection, path to elsewhere

state_variants.first_visit: A proper trail, showing signs of regular traffic.
state_variants.revisit: The southern trail, reliable passage onward.

locations.name: Hunter's Camp
locations.description: A small clearing with signs of recent habitation - a fire pit, crude shelter, scattered belongings. Someone has been living here, hunting the beasts of the wilds.

traits: campfire ring with split logs for seating
drying racks for meat and hides
llm_context.atmosphere: working camp, woodcraft expertise, hunter's domain

state_variants.first_visit: A professional hunter's camp, everything purposeful.
state_variants.revisit: The familiar hunters' camp, well-ordered as always.

locations.name: Wolf Clearing
locations.description: A rocky clearing surrounded by dense forest. Claw marks score the trees at the perimeter - territorial warnings. In the center, a shallow depression serves as a gathering place for the pack. Yellow eyes watch from the shadows.

llm_context.atmosphere: pack territory, open confrontation space

state_variants.first_visit: The many tracks suggest this is important to the pack.
state_variants.revisit: The wolf clearing, pack's meeting ground.
state_variants.pack_friendly: Wolves acknowledge your passage through their territory.
state_variants.pack_defeated: The clearing lies empty and silent.

locations.name: Predator's Den
locations.description: A dark cave mouth opens in a rocky hillside. Deep growling echoes from within, a warning that brooks no argument. Near the back of the cave, small shapes huddle together - bear cubs, clearly unwell.

llm_context.atmosphere: predator sanctuary, kill site, claimed territory

state_variants.first_visit: The evidence of violent feeding is unmistakable.
state_variants.revisit: The predator's den, danger dwelling within.
state_variants.predator_defeated: The den lies empty, threat ended.

locations.name: Flooded Plaza
locations.description: Once a grand plaza of the Sunken District, now partially submerged. Water laps at crumbling columns and the remnants of ancient fountains. The flooding gets deeper further east.

traits: water lapping at second story windows
llm_context.atmosphere: drowned civilization, loss made visible, water's conquest

state_variants.first_visit: The drowned plaza speaks of sudden catastrophe, life interrupted.
state_variants.revisit: The flooded plaza, water claiming what was built.
state_variants.water_receding: The water level has dropped, more of the plaza emerging.

locations.name: Survivor Camp
locations.description: An elevated area of dry ground where the survivors have made camp. A crude map scratched on flat stone shows safe paths through the flooded streets. The smell of smoke and damp clothes fills the air.

traits: makeshift shelters clustered on high ground
campfires smoking, laundry strung between poles
constant activity of survival and hope
llm_context.atmosphere: refuge of resilience, community forged by disaster

state_variants.first_visit: The organized chaos of survival. These people have made the best of desperate circumstances.
state_variants.revisit: The familiar bustle of the camp, life persisting despite hardship.
state_variants.water_receding: The camp buzzes with excited preparation as the floodwaters begin to retreat.

locations.name: Flooded Chambers
locations.description: The old guildhall, now flooded to chest height. Pillars rise from the murky water like drowning fingers. Shadows move between the columns - fish, grown predatory since the disaster.

llm_context.atmosphere: personal loss, homes drowned, intimacy of disaster

state_variants.first_visit: The waterlogged rooms still hold traces of interrupted lives.
state_variants.revisit: The flooded chambers, water claiming all.
state_variants.water_receding: The chambers are draining, revealing water's damage.

locations.name: Tidal Passage
locations.description: A fully submerged tunnel, once a street, now a twenty-foot underwater passage. Murky water obscures the distance, and the current tugs at anything that enters. Light is visible at the far end.

traits: corridor with water level rising and falling
tideline marks on walls showing rhythm
llm_context.atmosphere: tidal zone, rhythm of water, timing essential

state_variants.first_visit: The tideline marks make the danger clear - timing is everything.
state_variants.revisit: The tidal passage, rhythm continuing.
state_variants.low_tide: The water has receded, passage safe for now.
state_variants.high_tide: The passage is flooded, water surging through.

locations.name: Sea Caves
locations.description: Natural caves where the flooded streets meet the sea. Rock shelves rise above the water, creating islands of safety. Daylight filters through cracks in the ceiling, casting shifting light patterns.

llm_context.atmosphere: marine grottos, wave-carved, ocean's territory

state_variants.first_visit: The sea caves extend deep, ocean's patient excavation.
state_variants.revisit: The familiar sea caves, waves echoing.

locations.name: Merchant Quarter
locations.description: Deep water covers what was once the commercial heart of the district. Dark windows stare from water-stained buildings. A faint rhythmic tapping echoes from somewhere to the south.

llm_context.atmosphere: commercial district, trade suspended, empty abundance

state_variants.first_visit: The merchant quarter once bustled with trade. Now only silence.
state_variants.revisit: The familiar merchant quarter, shops standing empty.
state_variants.merchants_returning: A few brave merchants have reopened, commerce stirring.

locations.name: Merchant Warehouse
locations.description: A multi-level building with a flooded ground floor and dry upper stories. The merchant's sign is still visible above the waterline. Tapping comes from a second-floor window.

llm_context.atmosphere: storehouse, abundance suspended, commerce frozen

state_variants.first_visit: The warehouse holds significant supplies, waiting for trade's return.
state_variants.revisit: The warehouse, goods gathering dust.
state_variants.trade_restored: Merchants bustle through, inventory moving again.

locations.name: Deep Archive
locations.description: A magically sealed archive deep beneath the sunken district.

traits: sealed chamber deep beneath flooded streets
kept dry by ancient magic despite water above
glowworms covering ceiling, casting soft light
shelves of preserved books illuminated by gentle glow
spectral figure drifting between the stacks
scent of old paper and leather
llm_context.atmosphere: repository of ages, knowledge sleeping in darkness

state_variants.first_visit: The archive's vastness is staggering. How much knowledge lies forgotten here?
state_variants.revisit: The familiar archive, secrets waiting in the stacks.
state_variants.archivist_allied: The Archivist's presence makes the archive feel less forbidding, more welcoming.

locations.name: Cavern Entrance
locations.description: The western entrance to the vast Fungal Depths cavern system.

traits: wide mouth of vast cavern system leading deeper
air thick with spores and musty smell of fungus
threshold between surface and fungal depths
llm_context.atmosphere: gateway to wonder, entrance to living darkness

state_variants.first_visit: The glow from within is mesmerizing. What creates such beautiful light in the depths?
state_variants.revisit: The familiar cavern mouth, luminous fungi beckoning you inward.
state_variants.myconids_friendly: The fungi at the entrance pulse in welcoming rhythm, sensing friendly presence.

locations.name: Luminous Grotto
locations.description: A cavern lit by soft multicolored bioluminescence from mushrooms of every hue. A crystal-clear pool reflects impossible colors. The ceiling is too dark to read, but something is carved up there.

llm_context.atmosphere: bioluminescent wonder, fungal garden, living light

state_variants.first_visit: The grotto's natural illumination is breathtaking, life glowing.
state_variants.revisit: The luminous grotto, fungi glowing steadily.
state_variants.myconids_friendly: The fungi pulse in welcoming rhythm, cultivation tended.

locations.name: Spore Heart
locations.description: The living core of the fungal corruption.

traits: massive pulsing fungal mass filling chamber
mycelia threads spreading across every surface
llm_context.atmosphere: infection's heart, alien life triumphant and terrible

state_variants.first_visit: The massive organism pulses with disturbing vitality. This is the source of the corruption.
state_variants.revisit: The spore heart, pulsing with alien life.
state_variants.heart_weakened: The pulsing slows, the bioluminescence dims. The corruption is dying.
state_variants.heart_destroyed: The chamber lies silent, the massive organism reduced to withering husks.

locations.name: Myconid Sanctuary
locations.description: A mushroom-folk community deep in the fungal caverns.

traits: orderly rings of Myconids standing in silent communion
mushroom-folk communicating through colored spore puffs
air clean - they filter the spores
intelligence and harmony in alien form
llm_context.atmosphere: sanctuary of alien minds, beauty in strange forms

state_variants.first_visit: The myconids move with clear purpose and intelligence. This is no simple fungal growth.
state_variants.revisit: The familiar sanctuary, myconids tending their luminous gardens.
state_variants.elder_friendly: The myconids acknowledge your presence with welcoming pulses of light.
state_variants.corruption_cleansed: The sanctuary glows more brightly, freed from the taint of hostile spores.

locations.name: Deep Root Caverns
locations.description: A deadly cavern deep beneath the spore heart.

traits: massive roots thick as trees descending from impossibly far above
ancient bones scattered - others tried this path before
enormous tree roots penetrating from surface
living wood in stone chambers defying natural law
llm_context.atmosphere: root cathedral, life's persistence, worlds connecting

state_variants.first_visit: The roots reaching this deep defy natural explanation. Magic at work.
state_variants.revisit: The deep root caverns, living wood in stone.

locations.name: Town Gate
locations.description: The entrance to the Civilized Remnants, a settlement of survivors who have rebuilt some semblance of civilization. Guards in patched armor examine everyone who enters, checking for infection and dangerous companions.

traits: guard towers flanking entrance, windows dark
cobblestone approach worn smooth by generations
town crest carved above archway, paint faded
sense of abandonment and lost normalcy
llm_context.atmosphere: threshold to civilization's remnants, gateway to what was lost

state_variants.first_visit: The empty guard posts and silent approach feel wrong. This town should be alive with activity.
state_variants.revisit: The familiar gates stand as silent sentinel to the town within.
state_variants.town_restored: The gates stand proudly once more, guards nodding greeting from towers above.

locations.name: Market Square
locations.description: The bustling heart of the settlement, where merchants hawk their wares around a dry fountain. The smell of cooking food and forge smoke fills the air. Militia patrol the corners, keeping watch.

traits: cobblestone plaza with dry fountain centerpiece
merchant stalls standing empty, canopies tattered
scattered goods left where dropped in panic
town hall looming on northern edge
ghosts of laughter and haggling haunting the silence
llm_context.atmosphere: heart of lost community, commerce turned to memory

state_variants.first_visit: The scattered goods and empty stalls paint a picture of sudden catastrophe.
state_variants.revisit: The abandoned marketplace, forever frozen in flight.
state_variants.merchants_returned: A few brave merchants have returned, bringing life back to the square.

locations.name: Healer's Sanctuary
locations.description: A quiet building filled with the scent of dried herbs. Bundles hang from every rafter, and the sound of mortar and pestle provides a steady rhythm. This is where the town's healer practices her art.

llm_context.atmosphere: healing space, medical sanctuary, care institutionalized

state_variants.first_visit: The sanctuary's organization speaks of dedication to healing.
state_variants.revisit: The familiar healers' sanctuary, ready for patients.

locations.name: Healer's Garden
locations.description: An orderly garden of medicinal plants, both curative and deadly. Warning markers indicate the most dangerous beds. The healer carefully controls access to protect the unwary.

llm_context.atmosphere: medicinal garden, cultivation for healing, growing care

state_variants.first_visit: The garden is a living pharmacopeia, each plant purposeful.
state_variants.revisit: The healers' garden, herbs growing steadily.

locations.name: Council Hall
locations.description: Where the town's three councilors debate the impossible decisions of survival. The air is thick with tension and exhaustion. These are people trying to do right with no good options.

traits: town seal carved above speaker's podium
llm_context.atmosphere: seat of lost authority, power awaiting restoration

state_variants.first_visit: The empty council seats speak of leadership fled or fallen. Who governs now?
state_variants.revisit: The abandoned council hall, authority in abeyance.
state_variants.council_restored: The council seats are filled once more, governance and order returning.

locations.name: Broken Statue Hall
locations.description: A hall containing the shattered remains of an ancient stone guardian.

traits: hall dominated by shattered stone construct - ancient guardian
runes flickering weakly along guardian's limbs
inscription speaking of protection and purpose
llm_context.atmosphere: monument to destruction, glory fallen and mourning

state_variants.first_visit: The destruction here was deliberate. Someone wanted to erase what these statues represented.
state_variants.revisit: The broken statues, silent witnesses to past violence.

locations.name: Undercity Entrance
locations.description: A concealed trapdoor beneath the dry fountain leads to worn stone steps descending into darkness. The smell of secrets rises from below.

llm_context.atmosphere: descent, threshold to depths, gateway to ancient

state_variants.first_visit: The stairs descend deep, ancient city waiting below.
state_variants.revisit: The undercity entrance, darkness waiting below.

locations.name: The Undercity
locations.description: A network of cellars and tunnels beneath the town, home to those who operate outside the law. Dim lanterns cast long shadows. Here, anything can be bought or sold - for a price.

traits: ancient streets carved from living rock
buildings grown from stone rather than built
silence broken by distant water dripping
alien architecture with its own logic
llm_context.atmosphere: buried city, ancient mysteries beneath the known

state_variants.first_visit: This place predates everything above. What civilization built this?
state_variants.revisit: The ancient undercity, secrets in stone.
state_variants.lights_restored: Ancient mechanisms hum to life, proper lighting flooding the streets for the first time in ages.

items.name: ancient telescope
items.description: A brass telescope of ancient design, mounted on a swivel base. Through it, all five devastated regions can be observed. It seems connected somehow to a matching telescope in the Frozen Reaches.

state_variants.in_location: mounted on platform or lying disassembled
state_variants.examined: ancient telescope, awaiting lens and mounting
state_variants.repaired: restored to full function, optics gleaming

items.name: Keeper's journal
items.description: A worn leather journal belonging to the last Keeper of the meridian. Its pages detail the days leading up to the catastrophe.

state_variants.in_location: lying open to crucial page, beckoning reader
state_variants.in_inventory: weight of contained knowledge pressing against pack
state_variants.examined: keeper's observations of meridian fracture, warnings and hopes recorded

items.name: cleaning supplies
items.description: A bundle of soft cloths and gentle cleaning solution, preserved by the temporal stasis of the Keeper's quarters. Useful for delicate restoration work.

state_variants.in_location: supplies organized and ready for use
state_variants.examined: complete cleaning kit, tools for every task

items.name: animator crystal
items.description: A pulsing crystal that contains the essence of animation magic. In skilled hands, it could bring an inanimate construct to life.

state_variants.in_location: resting dormant, violet glow faint but persistent
state_variants.in_inventory: pulsing in rhythm with your heartbeat, eerily alive
state_variants.examined: awakening magic for dormant constructs, life given to stone
state_variants.in_use: pouring life-energy forth, animation magic cascading out

items.name: frozen crystal
items.description: A crystal shard on a pedestal, corresponding to the Frozen Reaches. Currently dim and cracked.

state_variants.in_location: jutting from ice or lying glittering
state_variants.examined: frozen crystal, ice magic in physical form

items.name: wild crystal
items.description: A crystal shard on a pedestal, corresponding to the Beast Wilds. Currently dim and cracked.

state_variants.in_location: half-buried in natural growth
state_variants.examined: wild crystal, primal magic in stone form

items.name: sunken crystal
items.description: A crystal shard on a pedestal, corresponding to the Sunken District. Currently dim and cracked.

traits: deep blue crystal shot with white

state_variants.in_location: lying in or near water, gleaming wet
state_variants.examined: sunken crystal, water magic preserved in stone

items.name: fungal crystal
items.description: A crystal shard on a pedestal, corresponding to the Fungal Depths. Currently dim and cracked.

state_variants.in_location: growing from fungal substrate, half-organic
state_variants.examined: fungal crystal, life magic in strange fusion

items.name: remnant crystal
items.description: A crystal shard on a pedestal, corresponding to the Civilized Remnants. Currently dim and cracked.

state_variants.in_location: shard lying among debris
state_variants.examined: remnant crystal, broken but still potent

items.name: frozen telescope
items.description: An ancient telescope encased in ice, twin to the one in the Nexus observatory. Its lens points skyward through a cracked dome.

state_variants.in_location: frozen in ice wall, perfectly preserved
state_variants.examined: telescope visible through ice, intact beneath
state_variants.freed: ice melted away, telescope ready for use

items.name: ice wand
items.description: A wand of pure magical cold, its crystalline tip never melting. The directed cold it channels can freeze enemies solid. Currently frozen deep within the ice cave wall.

state_variants.in_location: resting on frost-rimed surface, cold mist pooling around it
state_variants.in_inventory: weight reassuring, chill penetrating through pack
state_variants.examined: ancient ice magic bound within flawless crystal core
state_variants.wielded: frost magic surging through your grip, eager to be released

items.name: lore tablets
items.description: Ancient stone tablets lining the temple walls, their inscriptions preserved by the cold. They detail the guardian golems and their deactivation protocols.

properties.text:
The tablets describe the Stone Guardians in an ancient script:

'These constructs were forged to protect the temple's treasures. Four paths exist to pass them safely:

1. THE PASSWORD: Speak the words of unity: Fire-that-gives-life and water-that-cleanses, united in purpose.

2. THE CONTROL CRYSTAL: A command crystal lies hidden in the ice caves to the east. With it, full control is granted.

3. THE RITUAL: Offer fire and water together in the ancient manner. Steam shall carry your intent.

4. DESTRUCTION: Force may prevail, but at great cost. The guardians cannot be replaced.'

The tablets also note: The guardians are linked - what affects one affects both.

state_variants.in_location: standing upright or lying scattered
state_variants.examined: tablets bearing historical accounts, readable

items.name: warm cloak
items.description: A heavy fur-lined cloak that provides excellent protection against the cold.

state_variants.in_location: folded or hanging ready for wear
state_variants.in_inventory: bulky but essential cold weather gear
state_variants.examined: quality cloak, warmth guaranteed
state_variants.worn: warmth enveloping, cold held at bay

items.name: cold weather gear
items.description: Thick furs and layered clothing designed for extreme cold. Found in an abandoned camp, still usable despite years of exposure. Halves the rate of hypothermia in cold and freezing zones.

state_variants.in_location: gear bundled and ready for expedition
state_variants.examined: complete cold weather outfit, expertly made

items.name: preserved supplies
items.description: A pack of supplies from the abandoned camp, preserved by the intense cold. Contains dried meat, bandages, and a lit torch - still burning after all these years due to some enchantment.

traits: collection of dried and salted foods

state_variants.in_location: supplies stored in organized containers
state_variants.examined: well-preserved provisions, properly stored

items.name: partial map
items.description: A weathered map showing the Frozen Reaches region. Annotations warn of thin ice, mark the hot springs refuge, and mention 'fire creatures that respond to warmth.' The temple is marked with a warning: 'Guardians - do not engage without password or preparation.'

state_variants.in_location: tucked in explorer's pack or lying loose
state_variants.examined: partial map showing some of region layout

items.name: frost lily
items.description: A delicate flower that grows only in the deepest cold, its petals crystalline and shimmering. The Bee Queen would value this rare bloom.

state_variants.in_location: blooming impossibly in frozen soil
state_variants.examined: frost lily, ice magic in botanical form

items.name: ice shard
items.description: A shard of pure elemental ice, pulsing with magical energy. This is a waystone fragment - one of five needed to restore the Meridian Waystone.

state_variants.in_location: jutting from ice or lying glittering
state_variants.in_inventory: carefully wrapped against melting and cutting
state_variants.examined: ice shard, sharp and magically preserved

items.name: lens
items.description: A perfectly ground lens, frozen in the ice cave wall. Required to repair the ancient telescope. Fragile - must be extracted carefully with heat or it will shatter.

state_variants.in_location: embedded in ice wall, frozen for preservation
state_variants.examined: crafted for ancient telescope, focusing distant visions clearly

items.name: command orb
items.description: An ancient command orb, hidden in a side passage of the ice caves. This orb grants full control over the temple guardians - the best solution to the golem puzzle.

traits: warm to touch despite stone nature

state_variants.in_location: resting in alcove, runes glowing softly in darkness
state_variants.in_inventory: weight significant beyond mere mass, authority incarnate
state_variants.examined: control runes for stone guardians, key to ancient servitors
state_variants.active: blazing with authority, commands flowing through golden light

items.name: mounting bracket
items.description: A precision brass bracket designed to hold a lens assembly. Required to repair the ancient telescope.

state_variants.in_location: lying amid other brass fittings, still functional
state_variants.examined: bracket for mounting telescope lens, alignment runes intact

items.name: cold resistance cloak
items.description: An enchanted cloak radiating a subtle warmth. Provides full immunity to cold zones and 50% reduction in freezing and extreme cold zones.

state_variants.in_location: hanging with faint magical aura
state_variants.examined: enchanted cloak, cold cannot touch wearer

items.name: fire wand
items.description: A wand pulsing with inner flame, never cooling. The directed fire it channels can blast enemies with searing heat.

state_variants.in_location: lying amid scorch marks, air wavering above it
state_variants.in_inventory: warmth radiating through pack, comfortingly dangerous
state_variants.examined: primal fire magic barely contained within scorched wood
state_variants.wielded: flames licking along length, power thrumming in your palm

items.name: stone pillar
items.description: A massive frost-covered pillar, carved with ancient runes. Solid enough to hide behind.

state_variants.in_location: standing in puzzle chamber
state_variants.examined: pillar carved with star patterns, rotatable
state_variants.aligned: pillar locked in correct position, stars aligned

items.name: stone pillar
items.description: A massive frost-covered pillar, carved with ancient runes. Solid enough to hide behind.

traits: twin to first pillar, different stars

state_variants.in_location: standing opposite first pillar
state_variants.examined: pillar with complementary constellation carvings
state_variants.aligned: pillar in correct position, completing pattern

items.name: rusty sword
items.description: An old blade, pitted with rust but still serviceable. The edge is dull but could still cut with enough force.

state_variants.in_location: lying abandoned, rust claiming metal
state_variants.examined: rusty sword, needing maintenance but functional
state_variants.wielded: grip worn smooth, blade eager despite rust

items.name: dried meat
items.description: Preserved meat from the frozen camp supplies.

traits: meat preserved by ice and time

state_variants.in_location: frozen solid in ice region storage
state_variants.in_inventory: cold seeping through pack from provisions
state_variants.examined: magically preserved meat, edible indefinitely

items.name: bandages
items.description: Clean bandages from the frozen camp supplies.

traits: linen strips infused with frost magic

state_variants.in_location: bandages resting in perpetual cold
state_variants.examined: enchanted bandages, frost magic for healing

items.name: ancient torch
items.description: A torch that has been burning for years, sustained by some lingering enchantment. It provides both light and heat - useful for extracting items frozen in ice.

traits: wooden shaft wrapped in pitch-soaked cloth

state_variants.in_location: standing in sconce or lying ready
state_variants.in_inventory: careful storage to avoid pitch stains
state_variants.examined: well-made torch, pitch fresh enough to catch

items.name: spider silk
items.description: Strong, lightweight silk harvested from the giant spiders. Valuable for crafting and trade.

state_variants.in_location: spun in web or gathered in bundle
state_variants.examined: giant spider silk, stronger than steel

items.name: venom sac
items.description: A sac containing spider venom, useful for crafting poisons or antidotes.

state_variants.in_location: lying among spider remains
state_variants.examined: venom sac intact, toxin potent

items.name: bear cub medicine
items.description: A preparation of healing herbs, specifically formulated for the wasting sickness affecting the bear cubs.

state_variants.in_location: jar sitting sealed and ready
state_variants.examined: specialized medicine, formulated for bear cubs

items.name: venison
items.description: Fresh deer meat, still bloody. The wolves would find this irresistible.

state_variants.in_location: hanging or wrapped for preservation
state_variants.examined: quality venison, will keep for days

items.name: tracking equipment
items.description: Well-worn but functional tools for following trails - a hand lens, marking flags, and a leather pouch of tracking powder.

state_variants.in_location: kit laid out ready for tracking work
state_variants.in_inventory: tools of the tracking trade, organized
state_variants.examined: professional tracking kit, well-maintained

items.name: hunter's journal
items.description: A weathered journal filled with observations about the Beast Wilds. Notes on wolf behavior, bear territories, and bee trade routes.

properties.read_content: The journal describes wolf pack behavior: 'They respond to food offerings - venison calms even the most aggressive alpha. Three offerings usually earns trust.' Another entry: 'The dire bear guards sick cubs in a den south of here. She's desperate - healing herbs from the town might save them.' A final note: 'The Bee Queen trades flowers for honey. She accepts moonpetals, frost lilies, and water blooms.'

traits: pages marked with blood and dirt

state_variants.in_location: tucked in hunter's pack, tools of trade nearby
state_variants.examined: beast lore and tracking wisdom, hunter's lifetime learning

items.name: alpha fang fragment
items.description: A massive wolf fang, freely given as a mark of pack bond. It pulses with primal energy, warm with the alpha's trust.

state_variants.in_location: embedded in tree trunk, mark of territory fight
state_variants.in_inventory: weight of earned respect among pack
state_variants.examined: alpha wolf's fang, proof of combat prowess or friendship

items.name: royal honey
items.description: A golden comb of the Bee Queen's finest honey. Its scent alone is intoxicating. Consuming it grants full healing and cures most conditions.

state_variants.in_location: contained in wax vessel, glowing
state_variants.examined: royal honey, magical healing in edible form

items.name: air bladder
items.description: A preserved animal bladder that can hold air for underwater breathing. Three uses remain.

state_variants.in_location: bobbing slightly if in water, otherwise resting
state_variants.examined: sealed bladder, airtight and buoyant

items.name: waterproof sack
items.description: A treated leather sack that keeps its contents dry even underwater.

traits: oiled canvas treated for water resistance

state_variants.in_location: collapsed flat, ready to be filled
state_variants.examined: watertight sack, seams sealed and closure intact

items.name: water pearl
items.description: A luminous pearl that pulses with water magic. One of the fragments needed to repair the waystone.

state_variants.in_location: resting in tidal pool, waves lapping reverently
state_variants.in_inventory: coolness seeping through pack, tidal pull felt
state_variants.examined: water magic essence, key to flooded realm healing

items.name: lever
items.description: A heavy iron bar that can be used to move heavy objects.

state_variants.in_location: protruding from wall or floor
state_variants.examined: lever mechanism, function unclear but intact
state_variants.pulled: lever shifted, mechanism engaging with grinding sound

items.name: water bloom
items.description: A rare aquatic flower that blooms in the deep archive. The Bee Queen prizes these.

state_variants.in_location: floating on water surface, roots dangling
state_variants.examined: water bloom, aquatic magic in flower form

items.name: silvermoss
items.description: A rare moss with antifungal properties. Can reduce the severity of fungal infection.

state_variants.in_location: growing in silver patches on stone
state_variants.examined: rare silvermoss, magical resonance evident

items.name: silvermoss
items.description: A rare moss with antifungal properties. Can reduce the severity of fungal infection.

items.name: heartmoss
items.description: An ancient moss that grows only in the deep roots. It can cure the Spore Mother's blight.

state_variants.in_location: growing in warm red clusters
state_variants.examined: heartmoss, life essence in plant form

items.name: spore heart fragment
items.description: A crystallized fragment of the Spore Mother's essence, warm with gratitude. It pulses with soft bioluminescence, a gift for healing rather than destroying.

state_variants.in_location: sprouting from infected ground, pulsing with corruption
state_variants.in_inventory: warmth unsettling through pack, life too alien
state_variants.examined: fragment of spore heart corruption, needed for healing paradoxically

items.name: Aldric's journal
items.description: A scholar's journal filled with notes about the fungal depths, including hints about the mushroom puzzle.

state_variants.in_location: lying beside skeletal hand, final testament
state_variants.in_inventory: unsettling weight of another's last words
state_variants.examined: descent into madness chronicled, infection claiming researcher

items.name: spore lantern
items.description: A Myconid creation that produces light without fire, using bioluminescent spores.

state_variants.in_location: casting gentle luminescence in radius
state_variants.examined: living lantern, fungal light perpetual and cold

items.name: breathing mask
items.description: A Myconid mask that filters toxic air, allowing the wearer to breathe in poisonous environments.

state_variants.in_location: hanging by straps, lenses reflecting light
state_variants.examined: breathing apparatus, filter fresh and functional
state_variants.worn: view narrowed to glass circles, each breath filtered

items.name: bucket
items.description: A wooden bucket, useful for carrying water from the pool.

traits: rope handle worn smooth by use

state_variants.in_location: sitting ready for water-carrying or other tasks
state_variants.examined: well-made bucket, handle strong and rim intact

items.name: blue mushroom
items.description: A large mushroom with a deep blue cap. It pulses with a steady, rhythmic glow.

state_variants.in_location: growing from nutrient-rich surface
state_variants.examined: blue mushroom, safe for consumption

items.name: gold mushroom
items.description: A striking mushroom with a golden cap. Its glow flickers in an irregular pattern.

state_variants.in_location: sprouting like golden coins from substrate
state_variants.examined: gold mushroom, prized for many properties

items.name: violet mushroom
items.description: A vivid violet mushroom. Its rapid, frantic pulsing seems somehow unsettling.

traits: cap of deep purple shading to lavender

state_variants.in_location: growing in isolated violet clusters
state_variants.examined: violet mushroom, magic-infused and potent

items.name: black mushroom
items.description: A dark mushroom that seems to absorb light rather than emit it. It does not pulse at all.

state_variants.in_location: sprouting from dark crevices
state_variants.examined: black mushroom, intimidating but harmless

items.name: dead explorer
items.description: A dead explorer lies slumped against the far wall. Their clothing is covered in fungal growth, but they still clutch a worn notebook in their stiffened fingers.

state_variants.in_location: collapsed against wall or lying prone
state_variants.examined: explorer's remains, journey ended long ago

items.name: worn notebook
items.description: A worn notebook filled with detailed notes on fungal biology and cave exploration. The handwriting is meticulous, documenting observations about mushroom behavior and safe paths through spore-heavy areas. A scholar would find these valuable.

properties.read_content: The notes detail fungal symbiosis and the relationship between the Spore Mother and her environment. Key insight: 'The mushrooms respond to water - their glow reveals hidden patterns. Blue pulses steady, gold irregular, violet rapid and dangerous, black absorbs all.'

state_variants.in_location: scattered around explorer's body, final work
state_variants.examined: grotto ecosystem research, luminous mushroom properties noted

items.name: healing herbs
items.description: A bundle of carefully harvested medicinal herbs. Can cure the bear cubs' wasting sickness.

state_variants.in_location: bundle lying ready for gathering
state_variants.examined: quality healing herbs, properly dried and potent

items.name: nightshade
items.description: A deadly plant with poison-purple berries. Dangerous to handle without advanced training.

state_variants.in_location: growing with warning thorns visible
state_variants.examined: nightshade, poison requiring expert use

items.name: moonpetal
items.description: A rare flower that blooms only at night. The Bee Queen values these highly.

state_variants.in_location: growing in places touched by moon
state_variants.examined: moonpetal, lunar magic captured in bloom

items.name: stone chisel
items.description: A well-made chisel for working stone, useful for repairing the damaged guardian.

state_variants.in_location: lying beside half-carved block, work interrupted
state_variants.examined: magical chisel for repairing stone constructs, enchanted for guardians

items.name: town seal
items.description: The official seal of the Civilized Remnants, symbol of their authority. One of the fragments needed to repair the waystone.

state_variants.in_location: lying amid council chamber debris, authority abandoned
state_variants.examined: official seal of town council, commands obedience from citizens

items.name: bandages
items.description: Clean cloth bandages for treating wounds and stopping bleeding.

state_variants.in_location: bandages waiting for need
state_variants.examined: clean bandages, ready for emergency

properties.description: The high ceiling of the grotto, shrouded in darkness. Something appears to be carved up there.
A massive stone pillar carved with ancient geometric patterns. Wide enough to shelter behind during combat.
A massive stone pillar carved with ancient geometric patterns. Wide enough to shelter behind during combat.
The central altar of the temple, carved from white marble veined with gold.

traits: altar of white marble veined with gold
ancient symbols of protection and devotion
surface bearing temple treasures and offerings

perspective_variants.in_location: standing at the heart of the chamber, commanding reverence
perspective_variants.examined: ancient altar carved with protective wards and blessings, surface holds sacred offerings

properties.description: A recessed alcove in the temple wall, protected by a shimmer of ancient magic. An enchanted cloak hangs within, radiating subtle warmth.
A small chamber near the entrance, accessible without venturing deep into the temple. A fire crystal pulses with inner flame on a pedestal.

player.name: Wanderer
player.description: A traveler drawn to the fractured meridian by forces unknown.

the_echo.name: The Echo
the_echo.description: A spectral figure, translucent and flickering. The remnant of the last Keeper's child, bound to the meridian by love and duty.

traits: face familiar yet impossible to pin down
form flickering between solid and ethereal

waystone_spirit.name: Waystone
waystone_spirit.description: The damaged waystone at the heart of the nexus. Its surface is cracked and its light dim, but it still pulses with residual power.

traits: ethereal form bound to ancient stone
face worn smooth like weathered marker
voice like wind through carved runes
form pulsing in rhythm with waystone

alpha_wolf.name: Alpha Wolf
alpha_wolf.description: A massive grey wolf with intelligent eyes, scarred from many battles. It leads the pack that hunts these wild woods.

frost_wolf_1.name: Grey Wolf
frost_wolf_1.description: A lean wolf with grey fur, part of the alpha's pack.

frost_wolf_2.name: Grey Wolf
frost_wolf_2.description: A muscular wolf with a thick grey coat, loyal to the alpha.

salamander.name: Fire Salamander
salamander.description: A creature of living flame, small but intensely hot. It seems drawn to warmth and light.

steam_salamander_2.name: Steam Salamander
steam_salamander_2.description: A smaller salamander wreathed in steam and flame. It watches the lead salamander closely, mirroring its behavior.

steam_salamander_3.name: Steam Salamander
steam_salamander_3.description: A young salamander of flickering flame and mist. It looks to the lead salamander for guidance in all things.

stone_golem_1.name: Stone Guardian
stone_golem_1.description: A massive construct of carved stone, ancient runes glowing along its limbs. It stands motionless but alert, watching the temple entrance with eyeless vigilance.

stone_golem_2.name: Stone Guardian
stone_golem_2.description: A twin to the first guardian, carved from the same ancient stone. Runes glow along its surface in perfect synchronization with its companion.

hunter_sira.name: Hunter Sira
hunter_sira.description: A young woman with a hunter's keen eyes, currently injured and in danger. Her leg is badly broken and she's losing blood.

injury.summary: 'Beast attack,' she manages through gritted teeth. 'Pack of wolves... or what used to be wolves. Something's wrong with them.'

tracking.summary: 'I could teach you to read the forest... if I survive this. Help me, and I'll share what I know.'

beasts.summary: 'The beasts here aren't natural anymore. Something corrupts them. The wolves especially... they hunt in packs, coordinated. Dangerous.'

elara.summary: 'Elara... she's in the town. We grew up together. She could help me - if you could get word to her...'

spider_matriarch.name: Spider Matriarch
spider_matriarch.description: A creature of terrible size, her many eyes gleaming with alien intelligence. She guards her web and her brood fiercely.

wary: silk strands held taut and ready
allied: legs moving with purpose not threat

giant_spider_1.name: Giant Spider
giant_spider_1.description: A spider the size of a large dog, its legs clicking across the webbing. Part of the matriarch's brood.

giant_spider_2.name: Giant Spider
giant_spider_2.description: Another of the matriarch's brood, slightly larger and more aggressive than its sibling.

bee_queen.name: Bee Queen
bee_queen.description: A creature larger than a human, golden-furred and crowned with antennae. She rules the hive with ancient wisdom.

dire_bear.name: Dire Bear
dire_bear.description: A massive bear, larger than any natural creature. Her eyes hold both fierce protectiveness and desperate anguish as she guards her sick cubs.

traits: thick dark fur matted with worry
powerful claws capable of terrible damage
eyes that shift between rage and desperation
scars crisscrossing muzzle from past battles

hostile: reared up to full terrifying height
roaring warning that shakes the cave
wary: lowered to all fours but tense
glancing between player and sick cubs
vengeful: eyes empty of everything but vengeance

bear_cub_1.name: Bear Cub
bear_cub_1.description: A small bear cub, barely more than a yearling. Its breathing is labored and its fur has lost its luster to sickness.

traits: eyes too large for weakened face

bear_cub_2.name: Bear Cub
bear_cub_2.description: A small bear cub, slightly larger than its sibling. It too suffers from the wasting sickness, though it tries to comfort the other.

sick: breathing labored but steadier than sibling
pressing close to comfort smaller cub

camp_leader_mira.name: Camp Leader Mira
camp_leader_mira.description: A middle-aged woman with tired eyes but iron determination. She manages the survivors.

traits: practical leather armor patched many times
eyes that assess and decide quickly
voice carrying authority earned through crisis

old_swimmer_jek.name: Old Swimmer Jek
old_swimmer_jek.description: An elderly man with weathered skin and webbed fingers - a birth defect that made him legendary.

traits: body lean and sinewy from decades swimming
eyes clouded with cataracts but knowing

sailor_garrett.name: Sailor Garrett
sailor_garrett.description: A young man with tattooed arms, currently drowning. His eyes show terror.

traits: tattoos of ships and sea serpents
tangled wet hair plastered to face

merchant_delvan.name: Merchant Delvan
merchant_delvan.description: A portly man pinned under cargo. His face is pale from blood loss.

traits: rotund figure in fine but sodden clothes

the_archivist.name: The Archivist
the_archivist.description: A spectral figure in scholar's robes. Not a ghost exactly - more an echo, bound to the archive.

traits: fingers constantly moving as if taking notes
eyes that see through to truth
surrounded by faint shimmer of preservation magic

allied: barrier magic standing ready to protect both

predatory_fish.name: Predatory Fish
predatory_fish.description: Large fish with visible teeth, grown strange since the disaster. They circle and watch.

traits: sleek muscular body built for hunting

npc_aldric.name: Scholar Aldric
npc_aldric.description: A frail scholar with pale skin and dark circles under his eyes. Fungal patches are visible on his neck and arms.

infection.summary: Aldric winces. 'The spores got into my blood weeks ago. I've been rationing the last of my silvermoss, but it only slows the progression. More grows in the Luminous Grotto below, but I can barely stand. And the air down there would finish me in minutes.'

research.summary: His eyes light up despite his illness. 'I've spent years studying these fungi. The spores aren't just a disease - they're communication. The Spore Mother sends them to find hosts, yes, but also to connect. If I survive this, I can teach you what I know.'

spore_mother.summary: 'She's not evil, you know. She's dying too - the same blight that's killing me originated from her. She spreads spores in desperation. There's a rare moss in the Deep Root Caverns - heartmoss - that might heal her. But the air down there...'

npc_spore_mother.name: Spore Mother
npc_spore_mother.description: A massive fungal creature, part plant and part something else entirely. Her cap spreads wide, pulsing weakly with sickly bioluminescence.

npc_sporeling_1.name: Sporeling
npc_sporeling_1.description: A small fungal creature, an extension of the Spore Mother.

wary: torn between programmed hostility and hesitation

npc_sporeling_2.name: Sporeling
npc_sporeling_2.description: A small fungal creature, bound to the Spore Mother.

wary: torn between programmed hostility and hesitation

npc_sporeling_3.name: Young Sporeling
npc_sporeling_3.description: A smaller, younger fungal creature. It seems more fragile than the others.

wary: torn between programmed hostility and hesitation

npc_myconid_elder.name: Myconid Elder
npc_myconid_elder.description: A sentient mushroom of great age, its cap weathered with age-rings. It communicates through colored spore puffs.

greeting.summary: A cloud of blue spores drifts from the Elder's cap. Somehow, you understand: 'Soft-flesh comes to the Still Place. Why?'

cure.summary: Green spores pulse gently. 'The rot-within can be cleansed. But the cleansing costs. Ice-crystal from the frozen places, or metal-that-gleams. An exchange.'

resistance.summary: Purple spores swirl thoughtfully. 'To walk among spores without harm... this can be taught. But teaching requires trust. Trust requires time.'

spore_mother.summary: The spores turn a deep, sorrowful amber. 'The Mother suffers. The corruption spreads from her wound. If she falls... we all fall.'

cold.summary: Silver spores glitter. 'Ice-crystal cools the cure-making. Without cold, the cleansing burns too fierce. Bring ice from the frozen heights.'

gate_guard.name: Gate Guard
gate_guard.description: A tired-looking guard in patched armor. He examines everyone entering.

traits: young face trying to look stern
town militia uniform slightly too large
watching road with mix of duty and fear

suspicious: trying to seem more confident than feels

herbalist_maren.name: Herbalist Maren
herbalist_maren.description: A lean woman with stained fingers and sharp eyes. She knows her plants.

weaponsmith_toran.name: Weaponsmith Toran
weaponsmith_toran.description: A burly man with burn scars on his arms. He forges what the town needs.

traits: burns and scars mapping both arms
pride evident in every blade shown

curiosity_dealer_vex.name: Curiosity Dealer Vex
curiosity_dealer_vex.description: A thin person of indeterminate age with knowing eyes. They deal in oddities.

wares.summary: 'Looking for something... unusual?' Vex's eyes glitter. 'I deal in curiosities. Things the other merchants won't touch. Show me what you have, and perhaps we can arrange something.'

crystals.summary: 'Ah, rare materials.' They lean forward slightly. 'Ice crystals, spider silk, fungal extracts... I pay well for such things. Very well indeed.'

private.summary: 'Some transactions require... privacy.' Vex glances around carefully. 'Perhaps we could discuss certain matters more quietly. If you've proven yourself reliable.'

undercity.summary: Vex's smile widens. 'So you've heard whispers. Yes, there are places beneath the market... for those who know where to look.' They gesture subtly toward a shadowed corner. 'The trapdoor behind the broken crates. Tell them Vex sent you.'

healer_elara.name: Healer Elara
healer_elara.description: A middle-aged woman with gentle hands and tired eyes. She helps everyone she can.

healing.summary: 'Are you injured? Let me see.' She gestures to her workbench. 'I can treat most wounds and ailments, for a small donation to keep the sanctuary running.'

garden.summary: 'My garden is where I grow the rarer herbs. It's... not open to everyone. Some plants are dangerous in untrained hands.'

herbalism.summary: 'Teaching takes time and trust. Show me you're reliable, and perhaps we can discuss it.'

sira.summary: 'Sira?' Her eyes widen with sudden concern. 'She's like a sister to me. If she's hurt... tell me where she is. I'll gather supplies immediately.'

councilor_hurst.name: Councilor Hurst
councilor_hurst.description: A hard-faced man who speaks in practical terms. Lost his family to beast attacks.

councilor_asha.name: Councilor Asha
councilor_asha.description: A young woman with fierce convictions about right and wrong.

traits: silver hair braided with faded ribbons

councilor_varn.name: Councilor Varn
councilor_varn.description: A well-dressed man who counts everything in terms of trade value.

traits: thin scholarly figure bent from study
robes pocketed with notes and scrolls

damaged_guardian.name: Damaged Guardian
damaged_guardian.description: An ancient stone construct, shattered but not destroyed. Runes flicker weakly.

traits: massive stone construct cracked and broken
ancient runes flickering weakly along limbs
seated against wall in broken dignity

partially_awakened: head turning slowly to track movement
functional: rising to knees with grinding effort
deep voice resonating from stone throat

the_fence.name: The Fence
the_fence.description: A figure in shadows who deals in items of questionable origin.

traits: clothing chosen for blend not style

whisper.name: Whisper
whisper.description: A nondescript person who seems to know everything about everyone.

traits: voice soft as breath on skin

shadow.name: Shadow
shadow.description: You're not sure you've ever seen their face clearly.

traits: voice like whispers in empty rooms
